TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit WebAuthenticator extends System.Object
public ref class WebAuthenticator abstract sealed

Docs.summary: A web navigation API intended to be used for Authentication with external web services such as OAuth.
Docs.remarks: This API helps with navigating to a start URL and waiting for a callback URL to the app. Your app must be registered to handle the callback scheme you provide in the call to authenticate.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Threading.Tasks.Task<Microsoft.Maui.Authentication.WebAuthenticatorResult> AuthenticateAsync (Microsoft.Maui.Authentication.WebAuthenticatorOptions webAuthenticatorOptions);

.method public static hidebysig class System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1<class Microsoft.Maui.Authentication.WebAuthenticatorResult> AuthenticateAsync(class Microsoft.Maui.Authentication.WebAuthenticatorOptions webAuthenticatorOptions) cil managed
Public Shared Function AuthenticateAsync (webAuthenticatorOptions As WebAuthenticatorOptions) As Task(Of WebAuthenticatorResult)

public: static System::Threading::Tasks::Task<Microsoft::Maui::Authentication::WebAuthenticatorResult ^> ^ AuthenticateAsync(Microsoft::Maui::Authentication::WebAuthenticatorOptions ^ webAuthenticatorOptions);
static member AuthenticateAsync : Microsoft.Maui.Authentication.WebAuthenticatorOptions -> System.Threading.Tasks.Task<Microsoft.Maui.Authentication.WebAuthenticatorResult>

Docs.param: Options to configure the authentication request.
Docs.summary: Begin an authentication flow by navigating to the specified url and waiting for a callback/redirect to the callbackUrl scheme.The start url and callbackUrl are specified in the webAuthenticatorOptions.
Docs.returns: Returns a result parsed out from the callback url.
